General.Name: Beijing Hezong Science&Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Beijing Hezong Science & Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and distributes power distribution systems in China and internationally. The company offers network cabinets, column switches, box-type substations, transformers, other switches, cable accessories, etc. It also manufactures and sells lithium battery cathode material precursors, which include tetraoxide, tricobalt, cobalt hydroxide, and iron phosphate. In addition, the company offers power engineering design consulting services. Beijing Hezong Science & Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in Beijing, China.

3.Name: Mr. Shu  Zhang
3.Title: Non-Independent Director, Sec. of the Board & Deputy GM
